api.apiRequestFailed: The interface request failed, please try again later!
api.apiTimeoutMessage: The interface request timed out, please refresh the page and try again!
api.errMsg401: The user does not have permission (token, user name, password error)!
api.errMsg403: The user is authorized, but access is forbidden!
api.errMsg404: Network request error, the resource was not found!
api.errMsg405: Network request error, request method not allowed!
api.errMsg500: Server error, please contact the administrator!
api.errMsg503: The service is unavailable, the server is temporarily overloaded or maintained!
api.errMsg505: The http version does not support the request!
api.errorMessage: The operation failed, the system is abnormal!
api.networkExceptionMsg: Please check if your network connection is normal! The network is abnormal
api.timeoutMessage: Login timed out, please log in again!

portal.assetPlanningSegmentationCaption: Plan asset domains and stewardship by industry, business, or other lenses.
portal.assetPlanningLifecycleCaption: Cover creation, change, and retirement workflows with status-based lookup.
portal.assetPlanningAssessmentCaption: Evaluate asset value and quality with actionable recommendations.
portal.assetPlanningMapCaption: Visualize asset distribution across industry, business, and organizational dimensions.
portal.modelingStandardsModelingCaption: Support modeling, template import, field definition, versioning, and batch import/export.
portal.modelingStandardsManagementCaption: Classify, publish, and browse standards with lineage of references.
portal.modelingStandardsMaintenanceCaption: Maintain standards via templates, field stewardship, and version lifecycle.
portal.modelingStandardsAlignmentCaption: Detect conflicts across models or standards and guide reconciliation.
portal.catalogCurationDesignCaption: Curate directories by theme or Excel import to accelerate catalog build-out.
portal.catalogCurationOnboardingCaption: Onboard datasets from disparate systems with configurable collection methods.
portal.catalogCurationTaggingCaption: Build multi-level taxonomies, search tags, and manage bulk tagging.
portal.catalogCurationPublishingCaption: Run publishing approvals and manage sharing scope with review reminders.
portal.catalogCurationSearchCaption: Provide rich search, filtering, subscription, and favorites.
portal.catalogCurationAnalyticsCaption: Visualize catalog coverage, usage, and governance metrics.
portal.dataIntegrationAccessCaption: Configure multi-source onboarding and unified collection workflows.
portal.dataIntegrationSynchronizationCaption: Support batch and real-time sync strategies with job monitoring.
portal.dataIntegrationExchangeCaption: Manage inter-department or regional exchange channels and transfer status.
portal.dataIntegrationEtlCaption: Offer graphical tools for extract, transform, load, cleansing, and integration.
portal.dataSharingCatalogCaption: Maintain shareable assets, scopes, and expiry reminders.
portal.dataSharingApprovalCaption: Run exchange approvals with full logging, tracking, and audit trails.
portal.dataSharingCollaborationCaption: Coordinate cross-region or tenant exchanges with flow monitoring.
portal.dataSharingCrossBorderCaption: Govern cross-border transfers through application, filing, monitoring, and audit.
portal.dataSecurityPolicyCaption: Enforce access policies and controls aligned to data security requirements.
portal.dataSecurityAssessmentCaption: Conduct data security assessments and surface risks with remediation advice.
portal.dataSecurityMonitoringCaption: Continuously monitor posture, locate issues, and trigger alerts.
portal.dataSecurityIncidentsCaption: Record incidents with traceability, resolution, and lessons learned.
portal.dataQualityStandardsCaption: Define metrics, roles, and expectations for the quality management system.
portal.dataQualityAssessmentCaption: Assess critical data sets and deliver quality reports.
portal.dataQualityMonitoringCaption: Track indicators in real time with alerts and visual insights.
portal.dataQualityImprovementCaption: Manage remediation plans and close the loop on quality issues.
portal.serviceOperationsCatalogCaption: Expose tailored catalog services for different personas with on-demand publishing.
portal.serviceOperationsManagementCaption: Establish unified service governance, standard definition, publishing, and rollout.
portal.serviceOperationsMonitoringCaption: Visualize runtime status with monitoring, alerts, and analysis.
portal.serviceOperationsAnalyticsCaption: Analyze API calls and subscriptions across dimensions.
portal.serviceOperationsOperationsCaption: Manage API monitoring, versioning, release, and operational workflows.
portal.serviceOperationsApiFormatsCaption: Provide JSON, XML, CSV, and other standard formats for external services.
portal.serviceOperationsExportCaption: Deliver Excel, PDF, Word, and custom combinations for self-service exports.
